## Research Topics

Our laboratory focuses on advanced process systems engineering with emphasis on sustainability and efficiency.

### Core Methodologies

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-md-6}
#### Process Modeling & Simulation
- Mathematical modeling of chemical and biological processes
- Dynamic process simulation
- Techno-economic analysis (TEA)
- Life cycle assessment (LCA)
- Environmental impact evaluation
:::

::: {.g-col-md-6}
#### Optimization & Control
- Process optimization algorithms
- Advanced process control strategies
- Model predictive control (MPC)
- PID controller design and auto-tuning
- Real-time optimization
:::

::: {.g-col-md-6}
#### Experimental Design & Data Analysis
- Design of experiments (DOE)
- Response surface methodology (RSM)
- Sequential experimental design
- Model-based experimental design
- Statistical data analysis
:::

::: {.g-col-md-6}
#### Machine Learning & Automation
- Data-driven process modeling
- Neural network applications
- Process monitoring and fault detection
- Smart process automation
- Digital twin development
:::

:::

## Application Areas

### Energy & Environment

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
#### Carbon Capture & Utilization (CCU)
- CO₂ capture processes (membrane, adsorption)
- Electrochemical CO₂ reduction
- CO₂ conversion to chemicals and fuels
- Techno-economic and sustainability assessment
:::

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
#### Clean Energy Systems
- Hydrogen production and utilization
- Green hydrogen from renewable energy
- Oxy-combustion systems
- Bioenergy with carbon capture and storage (BECCS)
- Energy system integration
:::

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
#### Sustainable Chemical Processes
- Low-carbon chemical production
- Biomass conversion and valorization
- Waste-to-energy processes
- Process intensification
- Green chemistry applications
:::

### Biotechnology

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
#### Microalgae Biorefinery
- Microalgae cultivation optimization
- Metabolic modeling
- Lipid and biomass production
- Photobioreactor design and operation
- Downstream processing
:::

## Research Facilities

Our laboratory is equipped with:

- **Computational Resources**: High-performance computing for process simulation and optimization
- **Experimental Setup**: Pilot-scale reactors and analytical instruments
- **Software Tools**: Aspen Plus, MATLAB, Python-based modeling platforms
- **Data Analytics**: Machine learning and statistical analysis tools
